meanings.definition: Manufactured or produced in a mint.
meanings.sent1: The minted coins gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The minted silver bars were carefully stored in the vault.
meanings.sent3: The minted chocolates were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a freshly minted coin.
meanings.sent5: The minted medallion sparkled like a star in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The minted car looked brand new.
meanings.sent2: The minted book had crisp pages and no marks.
meanings.sent3: His minted shoes were so clean, they sparkled.
meanings.sent4: The minted diamond shone with flawless beauty.
meanings.sent5: The minted painting was a masterpiece of perfection.

meanings.definition: Having a fresh, strong, or invigorating flavor or scent.
meanings.sent1: The minted gum left a cool sensation in her mouth.
meanings.sent2: The minted tea was refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: His minted cologne made heads turn wherever he went.
meanings.sent4: The minted shampoo woke up her senses with its minty scent.
meanings.sent5: The minted lotion tingled on her skin, leaving a fresh feeling.
